The majority of this product’s cleaning power concentrates on removing odors and particles created by dogs. It won't take long before the scent of pets, their dander, and other odor that you don't like are gone.


The Winix HR900 is among the most recent versions that can be purchased from Winix and are specified in the making to deal with pollution caused by pets. Previous versions, such as the Winix 9000 and 9500, as well as the new HR950, are still viable options.


On the other hand, given that they are newer models, you should consider purchasing the Winix HR900 and HR950 if the price gap between them is not too large. As a result of the discontinuation of the HR950, I will concentrate the majority of my attention on this evaluation of the HR900.


Winix HR900 Air Purifier: Key Specs


Model: HR900

Dimensions: 16.3" 9.6" 23.6"

Filters: Pet-filter, plasma wave, Pet-filter, Pre-filter, Carbon Filter, HEPA Filter

Ionizer: Yes

Coverage: 300sq.ft

Warranty: 2 years


Winix's HR900 AP is aware that despite how significant pets may very well be, they may still significantly affect the air quality within a home. Because of this, our air purifier was developed expressly for the needs of those who own pets. The Winix purifier effectively removes allergens such as animal dander, fur, and odors. However, that is not all it can work with; it can also deal with pollen, spores, dust, filth, and scents, regardless of whether they are coming from people or their furry pets.


When you consider everything, the HR900 emerges as a formidable rival for a spot among the top air purifiers on the market at the moment. In point of fact, Winix's purifier features among the most extensive and time-consuming techniques for cleaning the air out of all of them. Afterwards the air has been into the purifiers through the ventilated grill on this device, it is passed through a total of five filters, comprising two prefilters, which provide further protection against harmful particles.


When the HR900 is in its automatic mode, the overall purifier will help you save money on your utility bills and improve the air by keeping a careful eye on the amounts of pollutants present accross the day.



Winix’s product enables you to turn your focus again on your responsibilities, whether they be at work or with your family, and it will still inform you thanks to the color scheme of the signal system that is in front location gadget. At its loudest, the air purifier produces only 55 DBA of noise, so it maintains a reasonably quiet operation throughout the process.


Because capturing animal hair is among the most challenging aspects of pollution control, the reality that such a purifier intends to handle pet hair, in particular, making it a highly astute purchase for people who own pets.


Winix HR900 Air Purifier: Design and Features


Because of its size, this purifier requires dedicated floor or wall space. However, because of its superior construction, you may put it anywhere in the room, and no one will complain.


It can capture pet hair and other large particles with a washable prefilter. A carbon filter that you can wash will ensure that any unpleasant pet odors get removal. It's effective against a wide variety of odors. This system also includes a secondary layer—the pet prefilter—to catch larger airborne particles like animal dander, fur, or other allergens before they circulate through the rest of the house.


To further protect against harmful particles, a HEPA filter gets installed as the final line of defense. The true HEPA filter is the most vital component of the whole setup, and Plasma Wave Technology is the last weapon in the fight against pet pollution. Plasma Wave Technology dismantles particles, odors, allergies, and other airborne impurities at the molecular level.


A 300-square-foot room was the optimal size for the Winix purifier. Such a space is ideal because that's where it can effectively filter out harmful airborne particles.


The intelligent sensors of the HR900 play a significant role. Sensors like this allow air purifiers to function at peak efficiency. There are dust sensors around the room that monitor the air quality and make adjustments as needed. There's a smell detector that works in tandem with the air purifier to eliminate any lingering aromas quickly.



Pollutants from pets, such as fur and dander, can trigger allergic reactions in many people. You may rest assured that the HR900 will effectively remove this hazard from your pet's environment.

The HR900 makes it possible to let your pets free reign of the house. The clean air provided by the purifier will help you maintain a healthy home environment. If you switch on Winix HR900, no one will be able to tell that you have pets at home despite having some unexpected guests.


I think this purifier would be fantastic for use in a bedroom. It also features a silent mode that is barely audible above a whisper. Even at its lowest setting, this product will flood the room with healthy oxygen. The quality of sleep in such a space is unparalleled.


The dust and odor sensors built into the HR900 allow for fully automated speed regulation. By selecting this option, you can let the air purifier choose the speed based on the level of pollution in the room. Long-term energy savings are possible with this setting. Light sensors will automatically shut off the lights when the air purifier is set to auto mode and placed in the bedroom. However, it will continue to operate in automatic mode, potentially employing turbo power if the air quality in the area is poor. Use the "sleep mode" setting if the noise is keeping you from getting a good night's rest.


Winix HR900 Air Purifier: Performance


It's worth noting that the prefilter of the Winix air purifier is only a piece of paper, in contrast to the complex mechanisms of high-end air purifiers like Rabbit Air purifier and Austin Air's purifier. It gets the job done, but its fragility means it might have to replace frequently. Yet, another air purifier with this sort of filter is unusual in its price range.


The Winix HR900's intuitive sensor is a notable feature in addition to the unit's five-stage air purifying procedure. In addition to keeping tabs on the air quality, this model provides instantaneous feedback in the form of a colored LED system on the air purifier's front panel. The HR900 then uses the data to determine the optimal speed of fan for thorough cleaning.



Lastly, the HR900 comes with a sleep mode that lowers the speed of the fan to a more manageable level. Notification lights are also disabled so that you may get a good night's sleep without interruptions. Winix’s HR900 has the best odor suppression and absorption capabilities ever tested on our site. Aside from removing odors, dander, and microscopic particles, the group found out that it was effective at removing pet hair.


The Improved Emission Control filter is novel in its construction and phenomenal in its performance. Because of the fan's low and subtle hum, the group agreed that it was barely audible in operation.


Winix HR900 Air Purifier: Benefits


The HR900's primary strength is the primary advantage of Winix air purifier would be the thoroughness of its cleaning. Most big particles, such as animal dander, are caught by a Pet Pre-filter; the few that make it through gather by a secondary, washable fine mesh prefilter. The use of both prefilters so increases the lifespan of the more advanced filters.


The next step in maintaining pleasant interior air quality is installing an Activated Carbon filter, which will absorb any lingering traces of smoking, chemicals, or volatile organic compounds (VOCs) from your pet. The next step is the HEPA filter, which is quickly becoming the industry standard for air cleaners. As part of the HR900 Pet, it can trap 99.97% of particles as small as 0.3 microns, such as mold spores, pollen, virus particles, and allergies.



Last but not least, the Winix Plasma ionizer cuts down on pollution even further. Considering that ionizers can sometimes generate ozone, which might irritate persons with asthma or allergies, that feature can be disabled on the HR900.

Users have noted that the unobtrusive, sophisticated style makes it suitable for a wide range of settings. There is a lot of praise for this purifier's efficacy in removing pet scents from houses where pets are present, which is excellent news for anyone who is worried about their house smelling bad before guests arrive.
